effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Dark Ranger General's Cinch

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to imbue you with Sanctified Swiftness, granting 74 Speed stacking up to 10 times.

After receiving 10 stacks, release the stored energy dealing 785,102 Holy damage split between all enemies within 10 yards.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 103,381 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,996 to 4,884 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,884 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of the Argent Crusade.  All reputation gains while in Northrend dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
